name: Monocrystalline
pros: Monocrystalline solar panels are known for their high efficiency rates. They can convert a significant portion of sunlielectricity, which means you can generate more power in a smaller space.Due to their high efficiency, monocrystalline panels require less space compared to other types of solar panels to produce the same amount of electricity.
